document_data.name: Honeysuckle
document_data.mainbody: The '''honeysuckle''' was a flowering shrub that could be found in various places in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Habitats:
* Honeysuckles were known to grow in the meadows of the [[midwood]] area of the forest of [[Cormanthor]].
* These shrubs grew in the middle section of the [[Black Plain]] in [[Sembia]].
* Honeysuckles were prominent in the [[Weathercote Wood]].{{Cite adventurers league/Uninvited Guests|11}}
* Honeysuckle was planted along the [[River Ith]] within the city of [[Darromar]] in [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Trivia: The scent of these shrubs was one of many that [[saurial]]s used to communicate emotions. The scent of honeysuckle expressed an emotion of tendernesss or concern.
